stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Breath-Seekers: The Secret Origin of All Life Uncovered!
stories.fantasy_story: For ages, our wisest alchemists believed all creatures arose from two tiny spirit-forms merging. A grand riddle persisted: how could they meet if one needed the very breath of air and the other dwelled without it? Now, ancient scrolls reveal a forgotten breath-seeking ancestor that united them all.

stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Find Body's Secret Charm to Quell Fiery Ailments!
stories.fantasy_story: Guild alchemists have unveiled a natural enchantment within the body to calm fiery humors. They found special oils derived from a person's very being can soothe the aggressive spirit-cells causing pain and long-lasting sickness. A new potion boosting these oils offers swift relief from discomfort.
